name: Grow (itch) (beikpan, pablodaza, d1rtyb00tz, MagnoGrande, Swlyan, Yuliana Alvar)
name_original: Grow (itch) (beikpan, pablodaza, d1rtyb00tz, MagnoGrande, Swlyan, Yuliana Alvar)
description:
Welcome to your personal greenhouse! Your only job here is to take care of your plants and protect them from any menace that may arise. But careful! If you don't do it quickly enough your plants may die.

How to play:
Grow is a game for mobile VR that will help you understand how to take care of different types of plants. 
To pick up items and take care of your plants pinch with your thumb and index finger.
Warning signs will appear to let you know what your plants need in order to be healthy.

Made by Team Megatoothbrush
* Beikpan
* Harajuku
* Swylan
* d1rtyb00tz
* Yuliana Alvar
* Daza

Theme: Easy to Play, Hard to Master
